overview:
Lauren Meller is the Vice President of Communications at iVillage. Prior to joining iVillage in October of 2009, Meller worked at Yahoo! as the Director of Corporate Communications for Advertising and Sales.

During her career at Yahoo!, Meller counseled senior executives on media relations strategy, managed crisis situations and led key advertising communications initiatives.

Before Yahoo!, Meller was Senior Public Relations Manager for Epinions, Inc. From 1997 â€“ 2000, she was Public Relations Manager for Excite @ Home, where she created and managed multi-million dollar PR programs and consumer events that supported the brand. She began her communications career in 1995 at Porter Novelli.

Meller graduated cum laude from the University of Vermont, earning a Bachelor of Arts in Sociology with a concentration in Communications.
